top.title: Trump says he does not want Somalis in US as ICE plans Minnesota operation
top.summary: The president says the US will "go the wrong way if we keep taking in garbage into our country".

top.title: Crisis looms in Israel over ultra-Orthodox conscription bill
top.summary: Lawmakers are considering a draft bill to end the exemption granted to ultra-Orthodox men enrolled in full-time religious study.

top.title: Former EU top diplomat Mogherini accused in fraud investigation
top.summary: The inquiry centres on allegations of favouritism in EU funding for a training programme at a school headed by Federica Mogherini.

top.title: India scraps order to pre-install state-run cyber safety app on smartphones
top.summary: The order to make the registration mandatory had led to a major backlash from several cyber experts.

top.title: Bank of England warns of AI bubble risk
top.summary: The central bank says US stock price valuations are their most stretched since the dotcom bubble burst.

top.title: Dell family to seed Trump accounts for kids with $250
top.summary: The donation will help seed new Trump-branded investment accounts.

title.#text: We played Metroid Prime 4, ask us anything
Spotify Wrapped 2025 turns listening into a competition
Mirumi the furry companion robot is now available on Kickstarter
